summary: A command‑line script that orchestrates the end‑to‑end training of an unconditional consistency model from scratch, handling dataset loading, model construction, optimizer and scheduler setup, loss weighting, EMA, checkpointing, and optional logging/validation.
business_intent: Enable researchers and developers to efficiently train and evaluate consistency‑based generative models for image synthesis, supporting reproducible experiments and rapid iteration on model architectures and training schedules.
